adjectives.description: doped (comparative more doped, superlative most doped)

examples: He was so doped after the surgery that it took him 2 hours to remember his name.

entries.meaning: (electronics) Describing a semiconductor that has had small amounts of elements added to create charge carriers.
examples: The silicon was doped with boron to make a p-type semiconductor.

entries.meaning: Covered with dope, a glue or paint like pore filler.
examples: The doped fabric covering the Hindenburg was very flammable.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of dope
